dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 2413 IH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 601 South Main Street in Elkhart, Indiana, as the “Staff Sergeant Jesse L. Williams Post Office”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Walorski (for herself, Mr. Visclosky, Mr. Stutzman, Mr. Rokita, Mrs. Brooks of Indiana, Mr. Messer, Mr. Carson of Indiana, Mr. Bucshon, and Mr. Young of Indiana) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 601 South Main Street in Elkhart, Indiana, as the Staff Sergeant Jesse L. Williams Post Office.

section.header: Staff Sergeant Jesse L. Williams Post Office

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 601 South Main Street in Elkhart, Indiana, shall be known and designated as the Staff Sergeant Jesse L. Williams Post Office.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Staff Sergeant Jesse L. Williams Post Office.
